popularityCurve.label: that triggered then a concern that maybe our visit was going to be perceived as political and the last thing that i want to do is have injured soldiers and the staff at these wonderful institutions having to sort through whether this is political or not or get caught in the crossfire between campaigns so rather than go forward and potentially get caught up in what might have been seen as a political controversy of some sort what we decided was that we would not make a visit and instead i would call some of the troops who were there so that's essentially the extent of the story

clusterList.phrase: that triggered then a concern that maybe our visit was going to be perceived as political and the last thing that i want to do is have injured soldiers and the staff at these wonderful institutions having to sort through whether this is political or not or get caught in the crossfire between campaigns so rather than go forward and potentially get caught up in what might have been seen as a political controversy of some sort what we decided was that we would not make a visit and instead i would call some of the troops who were there so that's essentially the extent of the story
